## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [An Introduction to Genome Assembly](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/assembly/tutorials/general-introduction/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)

## Features

* Includes [Galaxy Workflow Tests](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/faqs/gtn/workflow_run_test.html)
